bio: Since my childhood, I'm passioned by new technologies and computer science. Then, after I obtained my "Baccalauréat général scientifique" (French scientific high school diploma), and my DUT in Computer Science at the IUT of Paris Rives de Seine (formerly Descartes), I am now working as a full stack developer in apprenticeship in parallel with an engineer course in "Software and IS" at EFREI Paris.{linebreak}I would like to continue in this field to make it my full-time job and live from my passion.{linebreak}You will find on this site all my skills in those fields as well as my various projects.
timelineIUTSubtitle: IUT of Paris - Rives De Seine (formerly Descartes)
